thread.title: Artist Banksy opens derelict 'Dismaland' theme park
thread.title_full: Artist Banksy opens derelict 'Dismaland' theme park | Fox News

author: Associated Press
title: Artist Banksy opens derelict 'Dismaland' theme park
text:
Published August 21, 2015 Associated Press Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre Email Print The shadowy street artist completed his installation of 'Dismaland' exhibition, which features work of other artists such as Damien Hirst.
Inside Banksy's 'Dismaland‘ bemusement park Bansky describes the twisted take on Disneyland an “alternative to the sugar-coated tedium of the average family day out . Or just somewhere a lot cheaper.”
The elusive British graffiti artist Banksy has unveiled his latest project — a derelict seaside theme park called "Dismaland" complete with a run-down castle and a dead Cinderella.
The artist, best known for his stenciled street art, said it wasn't a "swipe at Disney, but a "festival of art, amusements and entry-level anarchism."
The project, staged at an unused swimming pool in southwestern England's Weston-super-Mare, is Banksy's biggest show to date. It includes art galleries featuring Banksy's own work as well as those from artists including Damien Hirst , alongside musical performances and arcade games.
Among the dark exhibits: a dead princess spilling out of her crashed carriage and a sculpture of a woman attacked by seagulls.
More on this... Inside Banksy's 'Dismaland‘ bemusement park
